entry.title: Bacon & Eggs
entry.summary: Recipes A loaf of your favorite bread Extra-large eggs, because you want a generous yolk. Your favorite bacon Steps Fry Your Bacon in a Skillet Reduce the Heat as the Bacon Starts to Sizzle Use Bacon Fat to Fry Your Eggs The Temperature of the Fat is Important Use Hearty Bread for Toast Baste Your Eggs with Bacon Fat ...
